# list-rules lists all urgencies
$ ick list-rules
URGENT
======
* urgent-rule

NOW
===
* now-rule

SOON
====
* soon-rule

LATER
=====
* later-rule

OPTIONAL
========
* optional-rule
#
# But a different urgency can be used as the minimum
$ ick list-rules soon
URGENT
======
* urgent-rule

NOW
===
* now-rule

SOON
====
* soon-rule
